chapters.title: Chapter 26: Connecting Lines
chapters.info: King Joal Ramedar, p. 378 (528)—The last King of Aldeshar before Artur Hawkwing made it a province. He married Endara Casalain, the governor of Andor. Their daughter, Ishara, later became the first queen of Andor. See also Casalain, Endara; Maravaile, Ishara.
